ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 15 - 17 in no time
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah, people pulling dvinn and the other Tower trash tend to clear out the zone real fast. That reminds me, there s an npc in Northern Ro named Dorn B Dynn...
ygData.messageBody:
yeah, people pulling dvinn and the other Tower trash tend to clear out the
zone real fast.
That reminds me, there's an npc in Northern Ro named Dorn B'Dynn... He is
supposedy lvl 16. But that is total BS. He cons green to a level 20. He
waaaaaaay undercons. You need like a lvl 40 druid or something to snare the
bastard bc he resists root to lvl 20s. Sometimes he resists root from higher
lvls too. Or it will say he's rooted and he'll still be moving. This bastard
hits hard too. I logged in to EQ one time and before I had fully logged he
was already attacking me. At lvl 20 I hit him once. He hit me 20 times in a
row. I was dead in about 30 seconds. I'm willing to bet he's actually the
same lvl as Dvinn.
Oh, and over lvl 20, Highkeep is a great place to hunt. I got 2 lvls in one
day.
luv,
-Su

> This Saturday I went from level 15 to 17 in a couple of hours
>
> In Crushbone (off of GFay), I was lucky enough to get into a full group
in
> the throne room. We killed EVERYTHING...If you can get as many bags
filled
> with the pads/belts from the cents and legos, you can level quick as hell.
>
> Only big downtime is when someone pulled Dvinn from the tower. If he is
in
> the area...just save time and run for the zone, because some moron is
going
> to try to pull him.
>
> at level 16...four CB belts = 1/3 of a blue bubble...basically just fill
up
> the bank and you're inventory and run to kaladim and change em in....big
> exp...
>
>
>
>
>
